Item.Name: Hide
Item.Description: The Hide Of An Animal That Might Be Of Some Use. Can Be Used In The Crafting Of Waeopns and Armour.

Item.Name: Leather
Item.Description: Made From Treating the Hides Of Animals. Can Be Used in the Crafting Of Weapons And Armour.

Item.Name: Wood
Item.Description: Random Sticks And Twigs Can Help Any Weary Traveler. Can Be Used In A Wide Variety of Crafting Recipies.

Item.Name: Treated Wood
Item.Description: Made From Treating Only the Best Of the Wood You Could Find. Can Be Used In A Wide Variety of Crafting Recipies.

Item.Name: Iron Ore
Item.Description: An Almost Worthless Rock, But Its Very Useful. Can Be Used For Crafting Weapons And Armour.

Item.Name: Iron Ingot
Item.Description: Made From Iron Ore. This Stuff Is More Reliable And Usefull Then Its Predicessor. Can Be Used For Crafting Higher Level Weapons And Armour.

Item.Name: Scale
Item.Description: The Scale Of A Dragon. Can Be Used In the Crafting Of Weapons And Armour.

Item.Name: Dragon Hide
Item.Description: The Hide Of A Dragon. Can Be Used In the Crafting Of Armour.

Item.Name: Dragon Heart
Item.Description: The Heart Of A Dragon. Can Be Used In the Crafting Of Potions.
